name: septentriones
message:
I'll have to try this version nest time I'm making pancakes. Personally, I tend to use a more Crepe-like recipe for thin large pancakes that you can roll with sugar or jam.
2.5 cups white flour
3 cups milk
2 eggs
2 tbsp baking powder
1tbsp surgar

thanks for another idea.
pinch of sea salt
olive oil
